item.title: Delivering gifts (Kaggle)
item.description: There are a lot of things we take for granted. One of these things is logistics. We assume that when we have one order delivered it will arrive on time, but we often overlook how difficult it actually is. Well, there was a Kaggle competition just about that. And they just made it harder. The [travelling salesman problem] is perhaps the best known NP problem. Given a set of cities, the goal is to find the shortest route that goes through all the cities.
